trans-unit.source: The Purchase Quote Manager is used to create price quotes to vendors. This topic describes fields and functions on the PQM page.

seg-source.mrk: The Purchase Quote Manager is used to create price quotes to vendors.
This topic describes fields and functions on the PQM page.

trans-unit.source: The PQM page is accessible from the cc|project menu by clicking Administration > Purchase Quote Manager to open the PQM List and then click New to create a PQM or View/Edit to open an exiting PQM.

seg-source.mrk: The PQM page is accessible from the cc|project menu by clicking Administration > Purchase Quote Manager to open the PQM List and then click New to create a PQM or View/Edit to open an exiting PQM.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Entered manually for PQMs created from the PQM page

trans-unit.source: Identifies the person responsible for the PQM; accessed from the Resource table.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of vendors that have been assigned to the PQM. This is done automatically if the Assign Vendors autom. check box is selected in the Options FastTab and vendors have been assigned to the item added in the PQM Lines FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of vendors that have been assigned to the PQM.
This is done automatically if the <span class="Bold">Assign Vendors autom.
check box is selected in the Options FastTab and vendors have been assigned to the item added in the PQM Lines FastTab.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether purchase quotes have been created or not. Click the value in this field to open the PQM Vendors page.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates whether purchase quotes have been created or not.
Click the value in this field to open the PQM Vendors page.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the status of the created purchase quotes have been changed to Verified or not. Click the value in this field to open the PQM Vendors page .

seg-source.mrk: Indicates whether the status of the created purchase quotes have been changed to Verified or not.
Click the value in this field to open the PQM Vendors page .

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a purchase quote has been placed. Click the value in this field to open the PQM Vendors page to view the quote that has been placed.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates that a purchase quote has been placed.
Click the value in this field to open the PQM Vendors page to view the quote that has been placed.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that created purchase quote(s) have not been placed. Click the value in this field to open the PQM Vendors page to view the quote(s) that have not been placed.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates that created purchase quote(s) have not been placed.
Click the value in this field to open the PQM Vendors page to view the quote(s) that have not been placed.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the vendor number of the placed purchase quote.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the unit cost of the placed purchase quote.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the unit cost of the placed purchase quote.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the difference between the Source Unit Cost and the Placing Unit Cost.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the difference between the Source Unit Cost and the Placing Unit Cost.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the alternate currency if different than local currency.

trans-unit.source: Displays the Direct Unit Cost in local currency.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the Direct Unit Cost in local currency.

trans-unit.source: Identifies a discount percentage for the PQM line.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the system date the PQM line was created from the Job Budget Calculation.

trans-unit.source: Displays the calculated cost of Quantity * Source Unit Cost.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Administration FastTab indicate the date the PQM was created and last modified.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Administration FastTab indicate the date the PQM was created and last modified.

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Options FastTab default from the settings in the PQM Setup page. These settings can be changed per PQM. Refer to topic "PQM Setup" on page 1 for more information about these fields.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Options FastTab default from the settings in the PQM Setup page.
These settings can be changed per PQM.

Refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="../CC PR/PQM Setup.htm#General" class="RelLinkPageNumber" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">"PQM Setup" on page 1</MadCap:xref> for more information about these fields.

trans-unit.source: The actions on the Actions tab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The actions on the Actions tab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Resets the status from XXXX to XXXX.

seg-source.mrk: Resets the status from XXXX to XXXX.

trans-unit.source: Copy from Header to Lines – transfers information from the Assigned Vendors

seg-source.mrk: Copy from Header to Lines – transfers information from the Assigned Vendors

trans-unit.source: Update Line Status – changes the status in the Assigned Vendors page to the previous status (e.g., Verified back to Created, and so on)

seg-source.mrk: Update Line Status – changes the status in the Assigned Vendors page to the previous status (e.g., Verified back to Created, and so on)

trans-unit.source: Creates purchase quotes for all Vendors, and opens the PQM Placing Matrix for quote selection (placing).

seg-source.mrk: Creates purchase quotes for all Vendors, and opens the PQM Placing Matrix for quote selection (placing).

trans-unit.source: The actions on the Navigate tab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The actions on the Navigate tab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Opens the PQM Matrix request page, where filters can be set then the PQM Placing Matrix page opens, where the quote information for each purchase quote can be viewed.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the PQM Matrix request page, where filters can be set then the PQM Placing Matrix page opens, where the quote information for each purchase quote can be viewed.

trans-unit.source: Opens the PQM Vendors page, where Vendors from the PQM lines have been copied or Vendors are added manually, lead times can be added, and the quote status is available once quotes are created.

seg-source.mrk: Opens the PQM Vendors page, where Vendors from the PQM lines have been copied or Vendors are added manually, lead times can be added, and the quote status is available once quotes are created.
